DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bioavailability 0.5mg dutasteride novel formulation compare currently market 0.5mg dutasteride soft gel capsule fast healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Bioavailability Dutasteride Novel Formulation Form Soft Gel Capsule Form Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine bioavailability 0.5mg dutasteride novel formulation compare currently market 0.5mg dutasteride soft gel capsule fast healthy male subject . This open-label , single dose , randomize , two-period crossover study healthy male subject . Subjects receive single oral dose 0.5mg novel dutasteride formulation single oral dose 0.5mg dutasteride soft gel capsule fast state . Each dose study medication separate 28-day washout period . Blood sample pharmacokinetic analysis take regular interval dose . Safety assess measurement blood pressure , heart rate , laboratory data , review adverse event . The study enrol approximately 35 healthy male subject ensure 30 subject complete study . The study conduct USA .
DOC.criteria: Healthy determine responsible experienced physician . Males 20 45 year age inclusive , time signing informed consent form . Male subject female partner childbearing potential must agree use one contraception . Body mass index within range 1830 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) ; weight range 5595 kg ( inclusive ) . Capable give write informed consent . Single QTcB < 450 msec . Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , alkaline phosphatase , bilirubin le equal 1.5xULN ( isolated bilirubin > 1.5xULN acceptable bilirubin fractionate direct bilirubin < 35 % ) . History postural hypotension , dizziness , poor hydration , vertigo , vasovagal reaction sign symptom orthostasis . Current chronic history liver disease , know hepatic biliary abnormality ( exception Gilbert 's syndrome asymptomatic gallstone ) . A positive prestudy Hepatitis B surface antigen positive Hepatitis C antibody result within 3 month screen A positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody . Subject mentally legally incapacitate . Use prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement . History sensitivity dutasteride , component thereof drug class history drug allergy . History sensitivity heparin heparininduced thrombocytopenia The subject participate clinical trial 30 day , 5 halflives twice duration biological effect investigational product ( whichever longer ) . Exposure four new chemical entity within 12 month prior first dose day . A positive prestudy drug/alcohol screen . History regular alcohol consumption . Consumption red wine , grapefruit juice , grapefruit related hybrid , jufen grape . The subject donate blood blood product excess 500 mL within 56 day period . Urinary cotinine level indicative smoke history regular use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 6 month . Unwillingness inability follow procedure outline protocol .
